rgb_hsl.palette

Class AnalogousPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • rgb_hsl.palette.Palette
      • rgb_hsl.palette.AnalogousPalette
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriadPalette

    public class AnalogousPalette
extends Palette
    Palette subclass used to generate a analogous color palette. An analogous color palette takes any color and uses colors with hues that are similar.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Noah Teshima

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnalogousPalette(Color color, int offset)
      Set the base color and the offset of adjacent colors for the analogous color palette.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class rgb_hsl.palette.Palette

        equals, getColor, getColors, getSize, getStartingColor, toString, writeToFile

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnalogousPalette

        public AnalogousPalette(Color color,
                        int offset)
        Set the base color and the offset of adjacent colors for the analogous color palette.
        Parameters:
        color - Color reference containing the base color to use.
        offset - integer value containing the offset of the two adjacent Colors in the palette
